location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Morley, East India Company Resident at Bushire, to Henry Moore, East India Company Agent at Bussora [Basra]

mods.abstract: The letter reports on the movement of ships, a sick seepoy [sepoy] who sails to Basra to see the surgeon there, and that Carim Caun [Karim Khan] has repeated an order for Sheik Ice [Sheikh â€˜Isa] to visit him at Schirass [Shiraz].
